mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wish(memberId, productNum, wishDate) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{productNum}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT w.memberId, w.productNum, wishDate, p.productName, pd.unitPrice, pd.discountRate, p.deliveryFee, p.mainImageFilename FROM wish w JOIN product p ON w.productNum = p.productNum JOIN productDetail pd ON w.productNum = pd.productNum WHERE w.memberId = #{memberId} ORDER BY wishDate DESC
SELECT memberId, productNum, wishDate FROM wish WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND productNum = #{productNum} ORDER BY wishDate DESC
